regen.absent_element: mechanism for adding additional roles when creating a user from a template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the addition of extra roles to a user record created from a template, beyond the role-specific settings inherited from the template.

regen.absent_element: situation of adding additional roles after inheriting role-specific settings from a template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow for the addition of extra roles to a user record after it has been created from a template and inherited the template's role-specific settings.

regen.absent_element: additional roles can be added after inheriting from template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow additional roles to be added to a user record after it has been created from a template

label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.
absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
